price: 16. Allí tendrán cuanto deseen y vivirán eternamente. Es una promesa que tu Señor cumplirá.
arabic: لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَٰلِدِينَۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعۡدٗا مَّسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā mā yashāūna khālidīna kāna ʿalā rabbika waʿdan masūlan
